name: Jam Space
description:
Fly around. Deliver Glass Shards to your friend. Shoot asteroids for extra money. Watch out for aliens. Beware if your armor runs out, your hull is next. Also, watch your fuel.

Weekly Game Jam - Week 276: Glass Shards

WASD to Move. B to Shoot.

Most art comes from Kenney Simple Space. The explosion is from Kenney Particle Pack. Wormhole, glass shards, and some others are mine. Music and sound effects made by me with Garage Band.
